section_purpose: To describe the experimental setup including datasets and hyperparameters, and present both qualitative and quantitative results comparing the improved model to NeuroSAT.
key_points: Description of datasets used for evaluation.
Specification of model and training hyperparameters.
Presentation of qualitative results supporting the connection to SDP.
Presentation of quantitative results comparing the curriculum-based model to the original NeuroSAT, including training efficiency.
dependencies: Section 2.4 (Graph Neural Networks for Boolean Satisfiability / NeuroSAT)
reproducibility_notes: Details of datasets used for training and validation
Validation accuracy threshold of 85% used as stopping criterion
